item.title: Obsidian sync with Github and Crontab
item.description: Create your own repository on Github Create new private repository on Github. Create the Obsidian vault Create you new vault in Obsidian. Initialize git Locate at Obsidian vault, Initialize git in local folder git init Add .gitignore in the vault First commit Add all files to the track of git git add . Write the commit git commit -m "<init><notes>" Push the commit to the remote branch git push sync shell In the sync.
